text: @TMobile @Tesla I live in #ATL and would take the red #teslamodel3 on a #roadtrip and visit family in CA, TX, & VA. I haven't been able to see them #irl due to #COVID19 All while streaming #Reggaeton and munching on #FlaminHotCheetos the whole way! #PickMeTmobile #TmobileTuesdays #contest
